record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - April 22, 2008)

[Page: S3266]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, on behalf of Senator Kennedy, I ask unanimous consent that Laura Kwinn, a fellow in his office, be granted the privileges of the floor for the remainder of the legislative session.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that two members of my staff, Nina Fallenbaum and Petti Matila, be granted the privileges of the floor during the consideration of S. 1315.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: First, I ask unanimous consent that Jerry Acosta, a military legislative fellow in my office, be granted the privilege of the floor during the remainder of today's session.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
